section.name: Requirements
section.p: Java (only the runtime JRE) is necessary to run the editor. You can use a jdk 1.4.2 or later. I don't use any java 1.5 or 1.6 features so if you don't want to upgrade your java version you can keep it as it is.

section.name: Installation on Windows
section.p: Double click on the installer and follow the instructions. It is pretty straightforward.

section.name: Java Web start
section.p: Java Web start is kind of a network installation of the application. The files needed to run the program are downloaded and stored on the user machine. When a modification is provided for the software, the user's copy of the program is updated if there is an active internet connection.
